experiences.title: E-commerce Inventory Management API
bullets: Implemented inventory tracking service using SpringBoot and MySQL, managing stock levels across 8 warehouse locations for 15K daily transactions.
Enhanced existing product search functionality by integrating Elasticsearch, improving query response time from 680ms to 420ms.
Developed RESTful API endpoints with MyBatis for database operations, supporting concurrent access from multiple frontend clients.
Optimized database queries by adding composite indexes after analyzing slow query logs, reducing peak load latency by approximately 38%.
Automated deployment pipeline with Jenkins and Docker, cutting release time from 14 minutes to 6 minutes.
Implemented unit tests using JUnit, increasing code coverage from 61% to 84% before merging to production.

experiences.title: Real-time Customer Analytics Dashboard
bullets: Developed analytics dashboard using React.js and Redux for state management, visualizing user behavior metrics for 12K daily active users.
Implemented backend data aggregation service with Node.js and MongoDB, processing clickstream events from web and mobile platforms.
Integrated Apache Kafka consumer to handle real-time event streaming, supporting approximately 500K events per day.
Optimized data pipeline by implementing Redis caching layer, reducing dashboard load time from 3.2s to 1.8s.
Deployed microservice on AWS EC2 with auto-scaling configuration, maintaining 99.7% uptime during trial period.
Collaborated with product team to refine data visualization requirements, iterating on chart designs based on user feedback.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Model Deployment Platform
bullets: Developed model serving API using Flask and SQLAlchemy, enabling data scientists to deploy PyTorch models without infrastructure knowledge.
Implemented asynchronous inference queue with Celery and Redis, processing batch predictions for approximately 8K requests daily.
Enhanced prediction accuracy monitoring by integrating Pandas and Numpy for statistical analysis, detecting model drift within 48-hour windows.
Optimized image preprocessing pipeline using Python and Scikit-learn, improving batch throughput from 120 to 185 images per minute.
Containerized ML workloads with Docker and deployed on GCP CloudRun, achieving cold start times under 4 seconds.
Developed automated testing suite to validate model outputs, catching regression issues before production deployment.

experiences.title: Distributed Notification Service
bullets: Implemented multi-channel notification system using Django and Celery, delivering email, SMS, and push notifications for 6K active users.
Designed message routing logic with Apache Kafka and Zookeeper, enabling reliable delivery across distributed worker nodes.
Enhanced existing template engine by integrating Java-based rendering service via gRPC, reducing template compilation time by 42%.
Developed monitoring dashboard to track delivery rates and failures, using SQL queries against MySQL database for historical analysis.
Deployed service on Kubernetes cluster with horizontal pod autoscaling, handling traffic spikes up to 3x baseline load.
Automated infrastructure provisioning using Shell scripts and Git-based configuration management, reducing setup time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.
